name: My Uncle's House
description:
After the recent death of your uncle, as the only living relative, you have the responsibility to take care of the old house. Explore the old memories of your uncle, housed in the old house.

Controles:

  • Flechas o ASWD: Move.
  • A (Z) : Interact.
  • B (X) : Photo.
  • Start (Enter) : Pause.
  • Select (Shift) : Inventory.

Made using  GB STUDIO by Chris Maltby.

Art by JuanO.

Thanks to the Testers
